title: Virginia Woolf: the moment whole (TEFC)
creator_credit: National Educational Television, Janet Sternburg and Alan Raymond
brief_description: Introduces the philosophy and literary style of the 20th century writer, Virginia Woolf, by presenting visuals of the milieu in which she worked complemented by selections from “A room of one’s own” and “The waves”, read and portrayed by Marian Seldes.
creator_credit_for_label: National Educational Television, Janet Sternburg and Alan Raymond
